name: blog_hero_image
description: Hero images for blog posts - professional, clean, visually striking
base_prompt: professional blog header image, clean modern design, high quality photography, sharp focus, centered composition
negative_prompt: low quality, blurry, distorted, text, watermark, logo, amateur, busy background, cluttered, noisy
alt_text_instructions: Describe the main subject and its relevance to the blog topic. Focus on what the image represents conceptually. Maximum 125 characters. Do not start with 'image of' or similar phrases.
